title: Hogwarts Autumn üçÇ Whomping Willow ‚óà Harry Potter inspired Ambience ‚óà Rain Showers & Soft Music
description:
Hogwarts Autumn üçÇ let's spend sometime by the Whomping Willow ‚óà Harry Potter inspired Ambience + Soft Music (Day to Night transtition) / Rain Showers and falling leaves / nature sounds and birds singing / wind blowing in the trees

‚ú® ASMR Weekly Presents Roleplays and Ambiences Inspired in Fantasy Worlds and Original Creations ‚ú® SUBSCRIBE to join the MAGIC!

‚óàLong "special" Ambiences have adds every 1 Hour in the first weeks, then they become "Safe for Sleep". Check them out Here: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMKpaijVPXO8abhwPWUiqem9jJqHfnrMj
------------------------------------------------------------------------
ASMR videos and Ambiences are designed to bring the watchers to a more relax and calm state of mind, Taking them to Cozy and comfortable environments.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚óàSubscribe to my Second Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/DreamWalkerChannel

‚óà VFX Wizard (Free Effects Channel): https://www.youtube.com/c/TheVFXWizard

‚óà Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/asmrweeklyofficial

‚óà Patreon(You get exclusive Early Access):https://www.patreon.com/ASMRWeekly

‚óà Galleons Tip Jar AKA Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=JUQFCSTMXYVXJ&source=url
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚ú® If you Enjoy my work on this channel, please share it with other people you think might enjoy it / Also, consider becoming a Patreon and get Exclusive Early Access, if you want to contribute financially to the existance of the channel.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
‚ãÑAutonomous sensory meridian response (ASMR) is a tingly experience characterized by a static-like or tingling sensation on the skin, It is most commonly triggered by specific acoustic, visual and digital media stimuli, and less commonly by intentional attentional control‚ãÑ

"I do lots of Harry potter inspired videos, re-creating Hogwarts places with soundscape design, lots of editing go into ambient sound design and also animating the rooms from pictures and artworks. I also create a lot based on other of my favorite franchises like Star Wars, Lord of the Rings / the Hobbit, Chronicles of Narnia, Sherlock, etc.  
There are lots of playlists you can check out, i try to keep it all organized so you have a good time discovering all of my content :)  I hope you enjoy and dont forget to subscribe, like and comment to support me to keep creating these! "
